dataList.name: An Apple's Twilight
dataList.desc:
When the fruit is destroyed, all parts are inflicted with 2 Fragile.
The fruit regenerates after 1 turn.
dataList.summary: Apply 2 Fragile to all parts when the fruit is destroyed

dataList.name: NOT FOR DISPLAY1
dataList.desc: After the head regenerates once, bringing the head's HP to 50% initiates a choice prompt.

dataList.name: NOT FOR DISPLAY2
dataList.desc: At the start of Turn 3, a choice prompt 1 where you can remove the Green Stem effect is initiated.

dataList.name: Entangling Roots
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Inflict 1 Bind to all enemies. This lasts until the root has been broken.
dataList.summary: Apply 1 Bind to all enemies until part is broken

dataList.name: Single Root
dataList.desc: The root gains 2 Attack Power Up for each intact arm.

dataList.name: Let the Blood Festival Flow
dataList.desc: The battle proceeds to the next phase after all the Clay Dolls are defeated.

dataList.name: DON'T LET THE KIDS READ THIS
dataList.desc: At the start of turn 2 in phase 2, choice prompt 1 is initiated.

dataList.name: Let the Fire Festival Ignite
dataList.desc: If both arms are destroyed or the main body's HP is brought to 70%, the battle proceeds to the next phase.

dataList.name: Frenzy
dataList.desc: During Phase 3 - Turn Start: Inflict 3 Burn to all enemies.

dataList.name: NOT FOR DISPLAY
dataList.desc: When HP is brought to 60%, choice prompt 2 is initiated.

dataList.name: Let the Star Festival Fall
dataList.desc: When HP is brought to 25%, the battle proceeds to the next phase.

dataList.name: NOT FOR DISPLAY
dataList.desc: At the start of turn 2 in phase 4, choice prompt 3 is initiated.

dataList.name: Idolatry
dataList.desc:
Does not die at 0 HP; instead, remains on the stage as an immobile and untargetable unit.
Suppressed when the Doomsday Calendar is suppressed.

dataList.name: Cracked Gold
dataList.desc: Heals HP every turn based on the amount of Golden Sheen.

dataList.name: Frail Core
dataList.desc: When the head is destroyed, all parts are immobilized next turn. The head regenerates after 1 turn.

dataList.name: Rotting Apple
dataList.desc: After the body is destroyed, all parts are inflicted with 2 Attack Power Down every turn.

dataList.name: NOT FOR DISPLAY
dataList.desc: NOT FOR DISPLAY

dataList.name: Upgrade Factory at Work
dataList.desc: When this unit is defeated, it revives next turn and gains 1 Surgery.

dataList.name: You Must Become Strong
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Gain 1 Protection.

dataList.name: You Must Become Strong
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Gain 2 Protection.

dataList.name: Wavering Desires
dataList.desc: In the 'Desirous' state, the unit self-applies 2 Fragile and 10 Bind , gains 1 skill slot, and changes behavior.

dataList.name: Ensnaring Desires
dataList.desc: The unit becomes 'Desirous' every time it loses 30% HP.

dataList.name: Shuddering Terror
dataList.desc: Gain 1 Protection for every ally that died this wave. (Up to 5)

dataList.name: Pulsating Arms
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Gain Attack Power Up and Protection by the amount of Instincts.

dataList.name: Damaged Arms
dataList.desc: Lose 1 Instincts whenever the unit takes damage from attacks.

dataList.name: Regenerating Shell
dataList.desc: Turn End: If the unit didn't take any damage from attacks during the turn, heal 5% HP and gain 1 Instincts.

dataList.name: Frantic Eyes
dataList.desc: Behavior depends on the amount of Instincts. Uses aggressive skills at +4 Instincts, and becomes defense-oriented at 3 or less.

dataList.name: Amplified Aggression
dataList.desc: When hit by an attack, gain 1 Instincts. If the unit has +4 at the end of the turn, enter a state of 'Frenzy'.

dataList.name: Frenzy
dataList.desc: In the 'Frenzy' state, the unit self-applies 3 Attack Power Up and 3 Fragile, changes behavior, and does not gain Instincts from being attacked.

dataList.name: Shimmering Rage
dataList.desc: At less than 50% HP, becomes 'Frenzy' every turn.

dataList.name: Amplified Aggression
dataList.desc: When hit by an attack, gain 1 Instincts. If the unit has +4 at the end of the turn, enter a state of 'Frenzy'.

dataList.name: Frenzy
dataList.desc: In the 'Frenzy' state, the unit self-applies 3 Attack Power Up and 3 Fragile, changes behavior, and does not gain Instincts from being attacked.

dataList.name: Rotting Skin
dataList.desc: Turn Start: At less than 50% HP, apply 3 Poison to the attacker when attacked.

dataList.name: Molt
dataList.desc: After this part is broken, if the other arm is not broken at the end of the following turn, this part regenerates with the same amount of HP as it.

dataList.name: Pained Writhing
dataList.desc: When both arms are broken, the unit self-applies 5 Fragile and inflicts 10 Poison to all enemies every turn.

dataList.name: Wriggling Instincts
dataList.desc: Behavior depends on the amount of Instincts. Uses aggressive skills at +4 Instincts, and becomes defense-oriented at 0.

dataList.name: Severed Arm
dataList.desc: When the arm is broken, the unit self-applies 5 Fragile every turn.

dataList.name: Fearsome Whistles
dataList.desc: If you have collected fewer than 3 'A Sign', Sinclair is inflicted with 1 Bind and Paralysis every turn.

dataList.name: Courage to Triumph Fear
dataList.desc: If you have collected 3 or more 'A Sign', Sinclair gains 1 Attack Power Up and 2 Protection every turn.

dataList.name: You Must Accept the Pain!
dataList.desc: Turn Start: If the unit has Bleed or Burn, heal 15% of max HP and gain 3 Attack Power Up.

dataList.name: Bliss of Execution
dataList.desc: After defeating an enemy, gain 2 Haste and 5 Damage Up next turn.

dataList.name: Overflowing Ecstasy
dataList.desc: Starting with Turn 3, becomes 'Ecstatic' every 2 turns.

dataList.name: Blooming Purity
dataList.desc: If Kromer's main body is brought to 50% HP, the unit gains 'Purity' for the remaining turns.

dataList.name: Flawless Flesh
dataList.desc: When the arm is broken, the part is inflicted with 2 Attack Power Down.

dataList.name: Blood Sac
dataList.desc:
Headless Ichthys' body has increased Wrath resistance.
Headless Ichthys' body has lowered Gloom resistance.

dataList.name: Fluid Sac
dataList.desc: While the 'Fluid Sac' status is active, the main body heals (20 * Fluid Sac) HP.

dataList.name: Boiling Blood
dataList.desc: If the body is broken while 'Blood Sac' is active, all enemies take 20 fixed damage.

dataList.name: Lightning Rod
dataList.desc:
When the telephone pole is hit, inflict 2 Rupture this turn to the attacker. At 5+ Lightning, every part inflicts 3 Rupture to the attacker, starting next turn. (Lasts until Lightning reaches 0)
When hit by a Sloth attack, the amount of Rupture inflicted is halved. (Rounded up)

dataList.name: Lightning
dataList.desc: While the telephone pole isn't broken, gain 1 Lightning after an attack. Whenever the telephone pole is hit by an attack, lose 1 Lightning.

dataList.name: Breaking Pieces
dataList.desc: When the telephone pole is staggered or broken, lose all Lightning. All attacks of Street Watchdog are cancelled for the turn.
